## Description {#details}

A remark type used for both emission and parsing.

## Private Constructors

### Remark() {#a73dc8f90db29215856a4d5cbcb631db7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::remarks::Remark::Remark (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/remarks/remark">Remark</a> &amp;)</>}
  labels = {["default"]}>
In order to avoid unwanted copies, &quot;delete&quot; the copy constructor.

If a copy is needed, it should be done through <code><a href="#a874b998ebd5a2b7ee061e3969c47b2b3">Remark::clone()</a></code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remark-h/#l00138">138</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/remarks/remark-h">Remark.h</a>.
